C

checkDicePoolString(String) - Static method in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Verify if a given dice pool string is valid, returning true if yes or false otherwise.

D

DEFAULT_DICES - Variable in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
If not specified, the default number of dices in a pool is 3.
DEFAULT_MODIFIERS - Variable in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
If not specified, the default modifiers in a pool is 0.
DicePool - Class in org.guruha.commons
The DicePool class stores the elements of a dice pool and allow retrieve them easily.
DicePool() - Constructor for class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Creates a default "3d" dice pool.
DicePool(Integer) - Constructor for class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Creates a pool with a dice number only.
DicePool(Integer, Integer) - Constructor for class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Creates a pool with a dice number and modifier.
DicePool(String) - Constructor for class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Creates a pool from a string.
dices - Variable in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Stores the number of dices in a pool.

F

FACES - Variable in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
GURPS only uses six-faced dices.

G

getDices() - Method in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Retrive the dice number integer from the pool.
getModifiers() - Method in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Retrive the total modifiers integer from the pool.

I

InvalidDicePoolStringException - Exception in org.guruha.exceptions
Exception for invalid dice pool string representation.
InvalidDicePoolStringException(String) - Constructor for exception org.guruha.exceptions.InvalidDicePoolStringException
Creates a exception with the wrong dice pool string in the message.

M

Default message prefix.
modifiers - Variable in class org.guruha.commons.DicePool
Stores the modifiers in a pool.
